revised_title: Investigating the Effects of Protein-free Tuberculo-Antigen and Antigen-Serum Mixtures on Rabbits
tldr: The authors investigate the effects of injecting rabbits with protein-free tuberculo-antigen and antigen-serum mixtures, finding that these injections can produce complement-fixation bodies. They also discover that digestion of the alcohol-ether extract with rabbit serum inhibits the production of specific sensitisers.
